body:
Hello guys Im here to talk about muy friend _LegitSkill_(sergiopa2000) , who has been banned weeks ago for "having" hacker no slow down, and the truth is that he just use a mod of 1.7 animations , and he appealed and the mod (Im not going to say the name, still u can ser un his profile) told he thought it was that and also said its not allowed.
Before him being banned of course de asked some staff if its allowed and all of them said its was(I have evidence...).Also want to comment I saw many people un vídeos un which they use the sale mod...
Thats all thanks for reading and comment ur opinión
PD:if I have many spelling mistakes its because Im with mobile and my corrector wants the words un spanish xdd

title: "1.7 animations mod..."

replies.body: A mod with 1.7 animations should be seen by the player only lol, if I'm not wrong

replies.body:
It is certain that it doesn't give you any advantage in game. It's just an animation mod such LabyMod which is allowed in almost all the servers in Minecraft. To be honest, I don't think it will give you an unfair advantage such as extended reach or improve your hit detection. I wouldn't give an infraction to someone that is using this mod (because I already tested it and it's the same as Minecraft Vanilla).

The moderating team will discuss about it, and he will get a response in his appeal if is needed.
